Actions.Text:
--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
--  CHOOSE TEXT FILE
--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
-- RETURNS:  POSIX Path of the file

-- RESTRICTS FILE SELECTION TO THESE TYPES OF TEXT FILE:
--  "public.text", "text", "public.html", "public.xml", "public.script"

set pathInputFile to POSIX path of (choose file with prompt Â¬
	"Select a TEXT file" of type {"public.text", "text", "public.html", "public.xml", "public.script"})
return pathInputFile
